\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Chanaan, \w called|strong="H8034"\w* Sue: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* wife, \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w her|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Her|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w She|strong="H7121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* third: \w whom|strong="H7121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Sela. \w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w she|strong="H7121"\w* ceased \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Her|strong="H1961"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* slain \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* slew \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w because|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* detestable thing.

Wherefore Juda \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Thamar \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* law: \w Remain|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* Sela \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w grow|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* afraid \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w might|strong="H6435"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* did. \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w* \w way|strong="H5704"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee \w a|strong="H5414"\w* kid \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H0518"\w* \w she|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w again|strong="H7971"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* suffer what thou wilt, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w pledge|strong="H6162"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* thou \w send|strong="H7971"\w* what thou promisest,

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H6965"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w putting|strong="H3847"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3847"\w* which \w she|strong="H6965"\w* had \w taken|strong="H5493"\w*, \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w widowhood|strong="H0491"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* Juda, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: Thamar, thy daughter \w in|strong="H1571"\w* law hath \w played|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w she|strong="H2320"\w* appeareth \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* big belly. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* Juda \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w she|strong="H2320"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6256"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H6256"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* ready \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* bed, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* appeared \w twins|strong="H8380"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*: \w and|strong="H6256"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* very \w delivery|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* infants, \w one|strong="H1961"\w* put \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* hand, whereon \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w midwife|strong="H3205"\w* tied \w a|strong="H1961"\w* scarlet thread, saying:
